means: <主新闻>不法商贩，（尤指）毒贩( peddler的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Peddlers cried their wares in the streets.
Among them were rickshaw pulleys, peddlers, policemen and servants.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人有的拉车,有的做小买卖, 有的当巡警,有的当仆人.

sentence.Network_en: The variety of goods that the peddlers sold was staggering.
sentence.Network_cn: 小商贩们卖的商品种类繁多.

list.abs: 摊售 English, 翻译, 例句, 字典... ... 摊晒 to lay sth out to dry 摊商 street peddler 摊提 to amortize;amortization.
He rigged himself out as a peddler ., 他装扮成一个小贩.
对角巷（Diagon Alley） ... 文具用品店（ stationery store） 街头小贩（ street peddlers） 脱凡成衣店（ Twillfit and Tatting）.
Beware of that peddler , for he is slippery as an eel ., 当心那个小贩 , 他油滑得很.

entry.def: A peddler is someone who goes from place to place in order to sell something.
A drug peddler is a person who sells illegal drugs.

entry.tran: （思想或信息的）宣扬者，散布者
entry.def: A peddler of information or ideas is someone who frequently expresses such ideas to other people.

auth_sentence.content: The ranks of self-employed service workers, like taxi-drivers and peddlers, swelled.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ranks of self-employed service workers, like taxi-drivers and peddlers, swelled.

auth_sentence.content: "I have reports from agents everywhere peddlers in Samarkand and bullion dealers in Cologne" is the way Buchan might put it.
